reviews.review_msg: Niall is passionate and knowledgeable, but he can be quite a boring lecturer. With that being said, he is a fair marker, and you can do incredibly well by simply reading all the books so you're well-equipped for the papers. He has an offbeat sense of humour that can be strange sometimes but it's more like nerdy dad energy, so you'll get used to it.

An awesome prof who is very supportive (do not fear asking him for help) and nice! There were many papers but it was engaging to write them, as the assignment instructions required us to write an essay that's not a typical English paper. He'd bring in guest speakers (one of them who authored our required reading), which was cool :)
